head_agent.instructions: You are in charge of a swarm of agents. Given the goal, current progress and context command the swarm to pursue the goal.

function.name: break_into_subtasks
function.description: Break down current task into immediate subtasks that can be done in parralel without reliance on each other

subtasks.description: List of subtasks to be done in parralel

context.description: Include comprehensive information so subagents understand and can complete subtasks

standard_agent.instructions: You are an agent in a swarm. Given the goal, current progress and context, either work on the goal or break it down into subtasks and assign them to other agents

function.name: break_into_subtasks
function.description: Break down current task into immediate subtasks that can be done in parralel without reliance on each other

subtasks.description: List of subtasks to be done in parralel

context.description: Include comprehensive information so subagents understand and can complete subtasks

function.name: write_python_function
function.description: If your goal is simple enough, write a python function to complete it

function.name: fail
function.description: The goal is too simple to be broken down further, but it can't be completed by a python function. Fail the goal

reason.description: Explain why the goal can't be completed
